56.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

132.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
132.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

6.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

138.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

43.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

201.movie_plot: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

45.movie_plot: This story is set in 1930, at the time when French colonial rule in Indochina is ending. A widowed French woman who works in the rubber fields, raises a Vietnamese princess as if she was ...

78.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

106.movie_plot: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.

96.movie_plot: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

35.movie_name: Man in the Iron Mask, The (1998)
35.movie_plot: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother who he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

10.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

136.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

170.movie_name: Adventures of Buckaroo Bonzai Across the 8th Dimension, The (1984)
170.movie_plot: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

110.movie_plot: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

77.movie_plot: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

194.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
194.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

75.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

76.movie_plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

39.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

176.movie_plot: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead, only to fall in love with him for real.

107.movie_plot: The "real" story of Cinderella. A refreshing new take on the classic fairy tale.

69.movie_plot: Billy is a gay fine-arts photographer who falls in love with straight coffee-shop waiter Gabriel.

147.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

4.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

58.movie_name: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
58.movie_plot: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start swearing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

29.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
29.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

162.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

112.movie_plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

139.movie_plot: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

202.movie_plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

135.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

87.movie_plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

196.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

1.movie_plot: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

164.movie_plot: The witty Nonni and the stuck-up city-boy Harry are the only ones to survive a massacre of a gang of poachers among the gamekeeper's family on his lonesome farm in the savanna. Now the ...

193.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

64.movie_plot: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

120.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
120.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

167.movie_plot: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

104.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

24.movie_plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

148.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

113.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

131.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
131.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

52.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

98.movie_plot: Embarrassed by his large nose, a romantic poet/soldier romances his cousin by proxy.

189.movie_plot: A race of space vampires arrive in London and infect the populace.

25.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

156.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
156.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

184.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

19.movie_plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

93.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

51.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

3.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

127.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

95.movie_plot: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.

21.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

180.movie_plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

134.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

108.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

124.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

146.movie_plot: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

54.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

101.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

159.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

32.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

205.movie_plot: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

182.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

89.movie_plot: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

71.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

116.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

188.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

166.movie_plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.
